item.description:
Announcing a new Meetup for The Fairfield County Ron Paul Meetup Group!

What: Multi-Tea Party Pre-Primary Rally

When: Saturday, August 7, 2010 1:00 PM

Where: City of Norwalk Town Hall
125 East Avenue
Norwalk, CT 06851

Host: Fairfield County Tea Party.

Time:
August 7 Â· 1:00pm - 4:00pm

Location:
Norwalk Town Hall

Created By:
Robert Willis

JOIN MULTIPLE TEA PARTY GROUPS TO RALLY AND DRAW ATTENTION THE THE PRIMARY THAT TUESDAY, AUG 10TH !

Same location as last time in Norwalk! Please invite all of your friends, the last event here had over 200 people!

Let's have over 1000 people. We can do it. Send to all grassroots email lists in CT and for meetups that you or someone you know is an organizer to or assistant organizer so you/they can create a meetup. barbara g. addition

Media outlets will be there, lets make this a big event to draw attention to the primary that Tuesday!
...
JOIN THE TEA PARTY!

http://www.fairfieldc...

via RosieHaas, barbara g.

RSVP to this Meetup:
http://www.meetup.com...
item.name: Multi-Tea Party Pre-Primary Rally
